project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line interface contact book that allows for adding, searching, updating, and deleting contacts, with data stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement user interface for adding contacts
Implement JSON file handling to store and retrieve contacts
Write tests for the add, search, update, and delete functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure they work correctly
